issue.title: When no action is availlable on resource, the action button should be disabled
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

When no action is available on resource, the action button should be disabled (visible, but not inactive).
It currently shows a blank menu (not very user friendly).
!no-action-availble.png!


**Fixed versions :** 4.3.2
